Liono: O Man how do these things happen to me. We got to Get the preds out of 
the base. Our number one Goal is to help the wounded. ::toses a rock across 
the doorway and watches it get Vaporized:: No way ((All wounded maximals in 
need of Cr Chamber type your name and location)) 
Tigerhawk:Keep them in there with megatorn  ::Grabs a piece of Sheet metal a 
slides it over the Door:: Weld it on 

Liono: Flaming Lion ::Melts the door keeping it in place Locking the preds in 
and takes another peace of sheet metal melting it there in place:: What about 
the vents?

Tigerhawk:Thats how we attack. ::Goes to Power Core Raw energon start Pumping 
it into the chamber:: Forcing them into beastmode to much energon will kill 
bot.  

Liono: That's not helping the vents they Know not to shoot at the energon 
because it is unstable and would kill them too.

Tigerhawk:Last but not least ::Picks up metal vent Grading and welds it Shut 
they are totally trapped no Escape vents and no Door way and there stuck in 
beastmode 

Liono: lets go get our friends in the Cr chamber. Just to be safe ::Hits the 
door Close panel causing the Door to shut and lock and smashes the panel::
